message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll take advantage of it.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget to stick to.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $110. This is a fair price considering the value it brings, and I think you'll be happy with your purchase.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?

I understand your budget is tight, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $105. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $102. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
